content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Good idea, it's a fun exercice

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Yes, definitely add shortest and reverse.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice clash, you can add the reverse mode I think ! And why not the length mode ! :)

General
* Similar clashes exist. I suggest you to change the requirement from rotating clockwise to rotating anticlockwise so that it is less similar:

https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/7075226ef068c286a8953565b1bbb70f32ea
https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/790e1e25f7d104e1529ff8411f3907f3e71

Goal
* Please format "#" as a {{constant}} and remove the quotation marks around it.

* Please format "." (in "dots (.)") as a {{constant}}.

* Please delete the example as it is already shown in the Example section.

Input
* Please format "4 lines" in <<bold>>.

* Please format "#" and "." as {{constants}} and remove the quotation marks.

Output
* Please format "4 lines" in <<bold>>.

Constraints
* Please format "#" as a {{constant}} and remove the quotation marks.

Thanks.

Done ! Let me know if everything seems alright to you.

Thanks for your time.
Yes, the contribution looks better now. Thanks.
